item.title: Fly tipping, 9th August
item.description:
Yet again more illegal fly tipping. Every time it is cleared more rubbish is dumped within a few days More preventative measures need to be implemented.

item.title: Tree vegetation on tree trunk blocks street lighting on road. Causing black zone., 9th August
item.description:
Tree opposite 20-36 phelp street Se17 2ph, has huge vegetation growing from tree trunk. This has not been tended to for the longest time. Now seriously overgrown, causes half of road to be pitch black. Women feel unsafe walking home, as cannot see if someone hiding in bushes/ also I have seen foxes residing in bushes at night. Vegetation on trunk needs to be cut back so it doesn't grow back.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree snapped in half, 9th August
item.description:
This tree has has split in half and is hanging over the footpath l. This is now stopping anyone from walking on the footpath. The only was to pass this part is to walk in the road which is dangerous to both road users and the general public. Particularly dangerous to parents with children and disabled people.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dorset Road, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New parking system pole fixed into pavement, 9th August
item.description:
I appreciate the council needs to install infrastructure to enforce the new parking zones. Unfortunately, this pole which I assume is for that purpose, has been placed in the pavement. This now creates a hazard where it's possibly blocking safe access by wheelchairs, pushchairs, and other mobility devices. There's ample place in the grass to fix this pole but someone decided this is best. I'm writing in the hopes that this can be rectified before further works are completed. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Coptefield Drive, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocking vision in & out of Harefield onto Onslow, 9th August
item.description:
There are 3 trees needing pruning in Onslow Drive of overgrowth low down all blocking vision for driving plus narrowing pavement access for pedestrians. One near no.3 onslow, the other two further up towards Royal Road. I have seen work carried out in Wren Rd so hopefully these too will be pruned accordingly. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 42, Onslow Drive, Albany Park, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loud music, public nuisance, 9th August
item.description:
At least 20 people are dancing to loud music, which is audible from a significant distance. The loud music is disturbing the peace and tranquility of the park. According to the signage, they have been performing at the bandstand since 14:00 and intend to continue until sometime between 19:00 and 21:00 tonight. Could you please put an end to this disturbance? If they have been granted a license to hold this event in the park, please revoke it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cumberland Gate, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag

item.title: 169 Kiln Place NW5 4AP, 9th August
item.description:
The post is bended and the lamps is broken. It looks dangerous as it may fall completely. This has happened a few times. Cars are not supposed to park on this street, but they still do and when a bigger car/ track moves around is when the damages to the street lights occur. Thanks in advance for your assistance

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Oak Village, Gospel Oak, London
